thread.title: Amazing Staff - Review

author: fatso2014
title: Amazing Staff - Review
text: I visited London for the 1 st time and hats off to the staff of this hotel,Friendly staff amazing ambience,comfortable at d end FEELS LIKE HOME.Thanks to the whole Team for making my stay worth.This hotel is always gonna be the place vr I would like to come and stay. AFFORDABLE ASVL
